page.title: Comparison of risk analysis Microsoft Excel add-ins

sections.section: The following is a comparison of various add-in packages available to do Monte Carlo probabilistic modeling and risk analysis. Add-ins covered are for Microsoft Excel on Windows. Mac software and tools for other platforms, such as R or Matlab are not included. Decision-making software is reviewed separately.
